thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 6 of 660
thread.title: GraciAnn

author: GraciAnn
title: GraciAnn
text: I ordered a beautiful Ray Ban frame w progressive lenses. I was very impressed with the communication I received from Sarah from start to finish @ the final product is outstanding. I even used the CD under chin method via photo for the PD measurement & lenses were spot on. I saved $300 by buying online & am already planning to buy a back up pair soon. So happy with my experience ~ Thanks FramesDirect!
